targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT EventType, Author, RepoName , count(*) AS Total
FROM "default"."github" 
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND Author IN ($Author) AND EventType IN ($eventType)
GROUP BY EventType, Author, RepoName
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT EventType, Author, RepoName , count(*) AS Total
FROM "default"."github" 
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694597007) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618607) AND Author IN ('ahinvinith') AND EventType IN ('push','pull_request')
GROUP BY EventType, Author, RepoName

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT Author, count(*) AS Push_Events
FROM default.github
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND EventType = 'push'
GROUP BY Author
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT Author, count(*) AS Push_Events
FROM default.github
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694596958) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618558) AND EventType = 'push'
GROUP BY Author

panels.title: Number of GitHub push events grouped by author

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT Author, count(*) AS Merge_Events
FROM default.github
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND EventType = 'pull_request'
GROUP BY Author
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT Author, count(*) AS Merge_Events
FROM default.github
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694596980) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618580) AND EventType = 'pull_request'
GROUP BY Author

panels.title: Number of GitHub Merge events grouped by author

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) AS GitHub FROM default.github
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND EventType = 'pull_request'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) AS GitHub FROM default.github
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694596901) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618501) AND EventType = 'pull_request'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT count(*) AS GitHub FROM default.github
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND EventType = 'push'
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT count(*) AS GitHub FROM default.github
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694596932) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618532) AND EventType = 'push'

targets.formattedQuery: SELECT $timeSeries as t, count() FROM $table WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY t ORDER BY t
targets.query:
SELECT * FROM default.github
WHERE $timeFilterByColumn(TimeStamp) AND EventType IN ($eventType) AND Author IN ($Author)
ORDER BY TimeStamp DESC
targets.rawQuery:
SELECT * FROM default.github
WHERE TimeStamp >= toDateTime(1694596869) AND TimeStamp <= toDateTime(1694618469) AND EventType IN ('push','pull_request') AND Author IN ('ahinvinith')
ORDER BY TimeStamp DESC
